Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.domain.Vehicle
public class Vehicle extends Object
Represents a vehicle used within a project.

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(String brand, String model, String vehicleID, VehicleTypeRepository type, double grossWeight, double tare, int currentKm, String registerDate, String acquisitionDate, int checkupFrequency)
      Constructs a new Vehicle instance with specified details.
      Parameters:
      brand - The brand of the vehicle.
      model - The model of the vehicle.
      vehicleID - The unique identifier of the vehicle.
      type - The type of the vehicle.
      grossWeight - The gross weight of the vehicle.
      tare - The tare weight of the vehicle.
      currentKm - The current kilometers driven by the vehicle.
      registerDate - The date when the vehicle was registered.
      acquisitionDate - The date when the vehicle was acquired.
      checkupFrequency - The frequency (in kilometers) for vehicle checkups.
